modding.desc: A quality of life patch that improves translations, UI clarity, adds quick spell animations, target HP display, and increases currency transfer cap.

reverse-engineering.desc: A file ripper that extracts hidden files from game archives. Supports various formats including audio (WAV, OGG), graphics (BMP, JPG, PNG), and video files.
Extracts assets from RAYS MEDIA FILE '*.mda' file containers.
Extracts 800x600 JPEG map tiles from '*.map' files. This tool was developed due to X-Ripper missing some map tiles upon extraction.
Extracts filename reference strings to view linked files - primarily used for viewing connected maps in '*.map' files.
Stitches image tiles into a single output.
